title: Meet the Remington models: Gia #2
description: Stunning Remington model Gia talks about the Remington Pearl straighteners and how they were used to create her look.

asset.title: Meet the Remington models: Gia #2
asset.description: Stunning Remington model Gia talks about the Remington Pearl straighteners and how they were used to create her look.
asset.author: RemingtonProducts

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Hair straightener Remington straightener which is obviously you can make your hair perfectly straight and you can curve it as well. I'm a girl that I'm not good at doing different things with my hair so to have a straightener. A straightener always saves me. You want it to work like properly and good but you look at the design as well. You want it to look beautiful and I think a lot of people don't understand that and I think Remington does so that's why they have the little flowers all over which I think is very pretty and you have a thing that shows you how hot it is so that's good. I usually use hair masks if I am in a hotel or somewhere and I don't have it with me. I just put a but more of a conditioner and just leave it for a while like mask like hair mask that always help. How you treat your body reflects your hair as well. One of the things that actually can make your hair look really bad is if you stress too much or if you don't drink enough water those are things that really reflect on your hair. I think people in general when they don't take themselves you know in a very serious way yeah more pretty.
